thread.title: Sofa and carpets ScS advert presenter has enraged social media
thread.title_full: Sofa and carpets ScS advert presenter has enraged social media

author: Marc Walker
title: Sofa and carpets ScS advert presenter has enraged social media
text:
News Sofa and carpets ScS advert presenter has enraged social media Her perky performances in the quick-fire TV ads, peddling discounted furniture, have sparked a wave of bizarre hatred Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Victoria fronts the latest ScS Sofas campaign Share this video Get daily   
A woman who fronts telly adverts for sofa giant ScS has been dubbed the 'most annoying woman in Britain' - by social media. 
Victoria Thomas' perky performances in the quick-fire TV ads, peddling discounted furniture, have sparked a wave of hatred on social media. 
From Reddit and Twitter to Mumsnet, an army of haters have posted scores of bitchy comments attacking the brunette, whose small screen manner seems to have a knack of winding people up. 
The actress and dancer, who has appeared in Emmerdale and Doctors, has been the face of Sofa Carpet Specialist for five years, reports the Daily Mail. Victoria Thomas, who has been hit with a barrage of online abuse, appearing in an ScS furniture advert (Photo: ScS furniture) Read More The Chase viewers cringe HARD as contestant gets simple question spectacularly wrong 
Mark Farnsworth wrote online: "Just realised that I have an unnatural hatred for the woman on the ScS adverts, and I don't know why." 
Others have taken a swipe at her 'white teeth', 'overdressed' look and annoyingly 'shiny and smiley' telly turns. 
In some hate-filled posts, apparently unhinged viewers have even wished that she 'burned in hell'. Victoria's appearance, including her dress sense, teeth and over-enthusiasm, have all been criticised (Photo: ScS furniture) Read More Katie Hopkins has ruled herself out of Celebrity Big Brother 2017 - for this bizarre reason 
James Carter commented: "Why is the bird on the ScS sofa advert dressed like she's off to Chinawhites?" 
Radio X DJ Chris Moyles has even joined in the moaning, claiming Victoria was 'way too happy' about stain resistant sofas and 'may need help'. 
One person wrote on Reddit: "It never actually occurred to me that she was a real person, filming in a real place. Victoria has also appeared in telly soaps Emmerdale and Doctors (Photo: ScS furniture) 
"Those adverts are so smug and false they registered as something more of a hellish computer animation abomination that nobody should have to suffer." 
Victoria, from Knutford, Cheshire, is a graduate of telly dance academy Pineapple Studios and once appeared on stage at the Brit Awards with rapper Kanye West. 
The married businesswoman runs two ventures, a performing arts school and a talent agency. Like us on Facebook
